vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A woman living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 2Ki.23.36;
daughter of: Pedaiah (H6305); married to Josiah (H2977);
mother of: Jehoiakim (H3079)
§ Zebudah = "given"
wife of Josiah and mother of Jehoiakim, both kings of Judah
vocabInfos._es_Definition: madre de Joaquim, rey de Judá
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西布大 这个陰性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "給與"
約西雅的妻子, 約雅敬的母親, 約西雅和約雅敬都是猶大國的王 (王下23:36)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西布大 这个阴性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "给与"
约西雅的妻子, 约雅敬的母亲, 约西雅和约雅敬都是犹大国的王 (王下23:36)
